snippet: In the rarefied world of haute couture jewelry, Taffin’s designer James de Givenchy offers a unique combination of elegance and edginess. It’s a mix he loves, and lives by.
lead_paragraph: In the rarefied world of haute couture jewelry, Taffin’s designer James de Givenchy offers a unique combination of elegance and edginess. It’s a mix he loves, and lives by.
